column4: Ok so basically, my Ubuntu installer says it is resizing my partition, but it has been at 0% for 15 minutes now, and the CD isn't actively spinning either.
(Would it at some point be an idea to kill the install / partitioner?)
it can sometimes help to do a defrag etc in windows first ive heard (never resized myself)
It is indeed ntfs, although it's not fragged alot I think
